mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM pc_dealer_brand_info brand inner JOIN ( SELECT company_id,dealer_company_id, brand_no, string_agg ( category_name, ',' ) category_name, string_agg ( category_no, ', ' ) category_code, status audit_status FROM pc_agency_contract where status in (8,9,10,11) GROUP BY company_id, brand_no, dealer_company_id,status ) category ON category.company_id = brand.company_id and brand.brand_no = category.brand_no and brand.agency_code = category.dealer_company_id WHERE brand.id in (select max(id) from pc_dealer_brand_info where is_valid = 1 AND audit_status = 2 group by company_id, brand_no)
and category.company_id = #{companyId}
order by category.audit_status asc
SELECT * FROM pc_dealer_brand_info WHERE id IN ( SELECT max( id ) FROM pc_dealer_brand_info WHERE audit_status = 2 AND company_id = #{companyId} GROUP BY brand_no )
